DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective : - To demonstrate immune response DTaP-IPV-Hep B-PRP~T non-inferior valence association PENTAXIM™ ENGERIX B® PEDIATRICO one month three-dose primary series . Secondary Objectives : - To describe group immunogenicity parameter one month three-dose primary series . - To describe safety profile vaccination group .
